pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class BorrowBookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.BorrowBookController

  • @Controller
 @Scope(value="session")
 @RequestMapping(value="/borrow-book")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:systemMessages.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:library-configuration.properties")
public class BorrowBookController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "borrow-book-choose-user"
    • "borrow-book-choose-books"
    • "borrow-book-confirmation"


    This controller also perform the actions on the books.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

      Constructs a BorrowBookController with the BookService, UserService, Environment, PdfService, AccessLevelControl, ReservationService and SearchEngineUtils.

      Cleans the search parameters and redirects to the view of "borrow-book-choose-user".

      Returns the confirmation as a PDF File
      String showBorrowBookChooseBooksForm(String selectedUserId, String title, String errorMessage, String bookId, String author, String publisher, String isbn, String systemMessage, boolean isAbleToBorrow, String extraMessage, Integer borrowBookChooseBookStartResult, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Locale locale)
      Returns the view of "borrow-book-choose-books" with model attributes:
      borrowBookChooseBookStartResult - The value of first index of the results showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink" showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink" resultRange - The description of pagination amountOfResults - The number of total results isAbleToBorrow - The user status determines whether the user is able to borrow more books borrowedBookList - The list of the borrowed books userReservationList - The list of user's reservations tempBookList - The temporary list of the books bookList - The list of the books theUser - The User object systemMessage - The one of the system messages extraMessage - The one of the system messages errorMessage - TThe one of the system messages
      String showBorrowBookForm(String borrowBookSelectedUserId, String borrowBookFirstName, String borrowBookLastName, String borrowBookEmail, String borrowBookPesel, Integer borrowBookStartResult, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Returns the view of "borrow-book-choose-user" with model attributes:
      borrowBookStartResult - The value of first index of the results amountOfResults - The number of total results showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink" resultRange - The description of pagination showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink" usersList - The list of User objects

      • showBorrowBookForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/borrow-book-choose-user")
public String showBorrowBookForm(@RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookSelectedUserId")
                                                                                    String borrowBookSelectedUserId,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookFirstName")
                                                                                    String borrowBookFirstName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookLastName")
                                                                                    String borrowBookLastName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookEmail")
                                                                                    String borrowBookEmail,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookPesel")
                                                                                    String borrowBookPesel,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookStartResult")
                                                                                    Integer borrowBookStartResult,
                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Returns the view of "borrow-book-choose-user" with model attributes:
        • borrowBookStartResult - The value of first index of the results
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink"
        • usersList - The list of User objects
        Parameters:
        borrowBookSelectedUserId - The String containing the id of the user
        borrowBookFirstName - The String containing the first name of the user
        borrowBookLastName - The String containing the last name of the user
        borrowBookEmail - The String containing the email of the user
        borrowBookPesel - The String containing the PESEL of the user
        borrowBookStartResult - The Integer containing the first index of the results
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view

      • showBorrowBookChooseBooksForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/borrow-book-choose-books")
public String showBorrowBookChooseBooksForm(@RequestParam(required=false,name="selectedUserId")
                                                                                                String selectedUserId,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="title")
                                                                                                String title,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="errorMessage")
                                                                                                String errorMessage,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="bookId")
                                                                                                String bookId,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="author")
                                                                                                String author,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="publisher")
                                                                                                String publisher,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="isbn")
                                                                                                String isbn,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="systemMessage")
                                                                                                String systemMessage,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="isAbleToBorrow")
                                                                                                boolean isAbleToBorrow,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="extraMessage")
                                                                                                String extraMessage,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false,name="borrowBookChooseBookStartResult")
                                                                                                Integer borrowBookChooseBookStartResult,
                                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                Locale locale)
        Returns the view of "borrow-book-choose-books" with model attributes:
        • borrowBookChooseBookStartResult - The value of first index of the results
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink"
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        • isAbleToBorrow - The user status determines whether the user is able to borrow more books
        • borrowedBookList - The list of the borrowed books
        • userReservationList - The list of user's reservations
        • tempBookList - The temporary list of the books
        • bookList - The list of the books
        • theUser - The User object
        • systemMessage - The one of the system messages
        • extraMessage - The one of the system messages
        • errorMessage - TThe one of the system messages
        Parameters:
        selectedUserId - The String containing the id of the user
        title - The String containing the title of the book
        errorMessage - The String containing the system message
        bookId - The String containing the id of the book
        author - The String containing the author of the book
        publisher - The String containing the publisher of the book
        isbn - The String containing the ISBN of the book
        systemMessage - The String containing the system message
        isAbleToBorrow - The boolean containing the status determines whether the user is able to borrow more books
        extraMessage - The String containing the system message
        borrowBookChooseBookStartResult - The Integer containing the first index of the results
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        locale - The Locale containing the user's locale
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view

      • generateBorrowedBookConfirmation

        @RequestMapping(value="/generate-borrowed-book-confirmation")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamResource> generateBorrowedBookConfirmation(@RequestParam(value="borrowedBookInfo")
                                                                                                                                                                                                String borrowedBookInfo,
                                                                                                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                                                                         throws FileNotFoundException
        Returns the confirmation as a PDF File
        Parameters:
        borrowedBookInfo - The String containing the information about borrowed books
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - A FileNotFoundException is thrown then the file can not be found.
